Reviews.Title: Samsung s5230
Reviews.Author: ya mama
Reviews.Content: This phone is really really good. But, when i got it it was used!!!! And i bought it for new. If i where you do not not buy from this sellergo to over stock really good hop this helps

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: H. Nguyen "H. N"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone about a month ago and the phone came on time.  However, it didn't have the converter for wall charger to use in the US.  I contacted them and they provide two within a week.  Good service.

Reviews.Title: problem....not unlocked
Reviews.Author: D. Tschetter
Reviews.Content: We had to wait some time to get the phone. No fault of the vendor.  It had to arrive in Africa via a pouch.  When it arrived the phone was NOT unlocked, as stated.  We had to pay to have that done.  The instructions to use the phone are practically unreadable.  So, generally speaking, we must learn by trial and error.  The phone is in good condition, but NOT being unlocked and unreadable instructions are a real problem.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tocco Lite cellphone
Reviews.Author: Hugo
Reviews.Content: The product arrives in perfect condition, very well protected. I bought 2 items for my relatives and both of them are happy with the performance of it. I do not know how good was this brand for cellphpnes but they convinced me to believe that they produce a real good product with a perfect balance between weight, versatility and functioning.

Reviews.Title: A+ seller
Reviews.Author: sabah
Reviews.Content: I received wrong color for my cell phone, and contacted the seller and he returned the money in a two days. That was a very quick response from him, I would recommend dealing with such a professional seller.A+++++

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work with AT&T;
Reviews.Author: erica
Reviews.Content: I've got the package almost a month ago, and they sent me a european cell phoneIt doesn't work so i called the OEM shop. They don't pick up the phone. Never.so I emailed them and got reply after 3 days. I gave them serial numbers and all that.They told me a week later that they set my cell phone with RMA which means I have to ship my cell phone back to themI don't even live in a city and, I live in dorms, so it's very hard for me to ship my package.When I was in a city for a break, I called them, emailed them to visit the shop myself so it would make a faster process.However, they still give me no reply, no contact at all. I wanted to fix my cell phone at first but now, I want a Full Refund

Reviews.Title: Its ok for what I need it.
Reviews.Author: Ana Carey
Reviews.Content: Is a cute little phone. I would be using this phone on Central America and its ok for making phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift for a family member. She loves it. It's not too complicated and it's easy for her to use.

Reviews.Title: Great phone but
Reviews.Author: kiscoama
Reviews.Content: this phone is great but it is impossible to open the back ,and it came with foreign language manual so it's very hard to undo any mistake with this phone.

Reviews.Title: GOOD BUY
Reviews.Author: Tok
Reviews.Content: Good product. First time of buying a phone from an individual and it turned out to be good. Phone arrived on time and it's just as it was advertised. My daughter even loves it more than i do because of it's features.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE!!!
Reviews.Author: Mardou
Reviews.Content: This phone is tiny and horrible. I was more disappointed when the seller charged me 15% restocking fee! SAVE YOUR MONEY FOR A SMART PHONE!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Star is AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Martha Cuevas "Cynthia Cuevas :]"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this phone because I wanted a touch screen lol. I had a blackberry and well I love the Star. I just wish it had more themes, but overall it's a really good phone!!! :] I love it!

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Wadyko "rwadyko"
Reviews.Content: Did not like it because it didn't have all the features I was looking for

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like T-Mobile and AT&T.; Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Touchscreen; EDGE Class 12; Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP; USB v2.0; SMS; MMS; E-Mail; Stereo FM radio with RDS.
Display with 256K colors touchscreen; Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate; Supports microSD (up to 16GB).
Talk time Up to 10 hs, Stand-by time Up to 700 hs.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S5230 Tocco Lite Quad-Band Unlocked Phone with 3 MP Camera, MP3, Video Player, and MicroSD Slot--International Version with Warranty (White)
